    • About Stacy Esser


    Stacy Esser is a distinguished Realtor® based in Tenafly, New Jersey. She has been providing her excellent marketing, merchandising, staging, negotiation, and consulting services to sellers and buyers of residential property in Bergen County for the last eight years. The Stacy Esser Group, a team of specialists is ranked No. 1 on the New Jersey Multiple Listing Service (NJMLS) and No. 1 in Tenafly with a sales volume of $80 million in 2017.

    We believe our clients deserve the very best including marketing, communication & client services. Building relationships that last is our BIG WHY. We provide a proactive, comprehensive marketing plan accompanied by a five-star luxury client approach—no matter the price range. Everyone deserves a luxury experience.

    In 2013, Stacy founded Time to Stage which provides extensive complimentary staging to all her sellers. Quickly realizing that you can’t change the location or property size, Stacy set out to change the way a buyer feels about a home. The result is a higher sale price in a shorter amount of time. Anyone can list a home, we market the home.
